description.narrative:
AgriProFocus is a global network with activities in 14 countries, including Zambia. AgriProFocus convenes stakeholders from the private and public sector and civil society that are committed to work with entrepreneurial farmers. In Zambia, Agriterra has been benefiting from AgriProFocus as a network organisation providing key contacts in the Zambian agricultural sector including cooperatives and farmer organisations, organising network platforms to promote Agriterra visibility and acquisition, forging business linkages and jointly promoting youth participation, gender, access to finance and dairy development at the level of organised farmers. Collaboration between Agriterra and AgriProFocus in 2017 is service-driven and based on a concrete Agriterra need and its direct impact on the Agriterra result areas.
In 2017, collaboration between Agriterra and AgriProFocus in Zambia is focused on the following activities: - Agriterra participation in the Cooperative Day in Southern Province (7th July) - Agriterra participation in the Chipata Business Platform (24th-25th August) - Agriterra participation in the Choma Business Platform (October) - Agriterra participation in the Gender track with CAZ and DAZ (follow-up of 2016 collaboration)
Enhance visibility of Agriterra in Zambia for acquisition of new clients and paid services
Advise days. The value is summarized by year
Advise days. The value is summarized by year
Lobby and advocacy / Strengthened recognition and integration by relevant stakeholders of FO’s role and position in specific public policies, and value chains
